text: It is not unusual to find daemons among the Fimir war and raiding parties, which are summoned and bound by the Dirachs.
Through gruesome rituals and sacrifices, the mightiest daemons are summoned to aid the war effort of the Fimir.

Giant Trolls are usually avoided by their smaller kin and have plenty of room for themselves. The messy leftovers of their meals often attract feral Wyverns which sometimes will follow the trolls around in the hope of more easy prey.
Trollz are sacrificed here and either victim or executioner can gain the dark lords blessings in return.
Here smaller Trollz are rounded up & forced to fight in cages, much to the amusement of their bigger kin.
From the chamber, chilling screams can be heard, but what emerges is far more terrible to behold.
Trollz fight here over spoils with some known to devour their fallen foes afterwards.
Nearer to the Chaos Wastes, Trolls become more disturbing and macabre, the Dark Gods watch the fiercest of Trolls fight, offering their favour to the victors.
Only the ardest of Trolls can fight here and truly prove themselves to be the best.

Trolls get shinies and food from travellers passing over the fords, log crossings & old stone bridges they control. They make simple repairs, ensuring its continued use, a behaviour far from the destruction trolls are feared for.
Only a troll could love such a stench.
After a feast, they pile high the remaining bones and limbs in respect to the Dark Gods.
